name: Balls of Bomb
description:
One-Eyed alien    travels through worm hole to Earth and prepares to occupy it. You're the commander  of UN, please read the hints and click the relevant button to activate  the sky shield against the bombs.  Keep 100% correct rate to defeat  enemy and unlock bonus.

Mouse Click / Touch Screen to select.

Relax and play to learn geography of the world. Play with friends can achieve better result.

Created by: Yongli (Eric) Wang &  Ryan Valdes

bananabizgames@gmail.com
